channel.description: Recent content in Dialog on Small Fire`s Blog

item.title: Dialog 逻辑控制
item.description: Dialog 屏幕操作 语法 Module ... END MODULE. SET screen xxxx . CALL screen xxxx. LEAVE screen. CALL screen xxx [starting at lc ur] [ending at rc lr]. (Modal dialog box类型) SET CURSOR FIELD <f> [offset <o>]. MODULE EXIT AT EXIT-COMMAND. Static Attributes Attribute Attribute Attribute Attribute Attribute Attribute screen-name screen-active screen-invisible screen-input screen-group1 screen-group3 screen-length screen-required screen-intensified screen-output screen-group2 screen-group4 字

item.title: Dialog 程序简介
item.description: SAP-ABAP 支持两种类型的程序：Report 和 Dialog。如果 ABAP 程序需要用户输入或则当我们需要在屏幕之间来回导航时，则使用 Dialog 编程。 对话程序的创建类型
